description: [``botocore``] Added optional CallLeg field to StartSpeakerSearchTask API request
[``botocore``] Added Runtime parameter to allow selection of Ray Runtime
[``botocore``] Updating description of GetMinuteUsage to be clearer.

[``botocore``] Campaigns now support selecting Timestream or S3 as the data destination, Signal catalogs now support "Deprecation" keyword released in VSS v2.1 and "Comment" keyword released in VSS v3.0
[``botocore``] This release adds API support for political views for the maps service APIs: CreateMap, UpdateMap, DescribeMap.
[``botocore``] Amazon MemoryDB for Redis now supports AWS Identity and Access Management authentication access to Redis clusters starting with redis-engine version 7.0
[``botocore``] This release provides support for the exclusion of certain columns for training when creating a solution and creating or updating a recommender with Amazon Personalize.
[``botocore``] Amazon Polly adds 2 new voices - Sofie (da-DK) and Niamh (en-IE)

[``botocore``] Added new resource detail objects to ASFF, including resources for AwsGuardDutyDetector, AwsAmazonMqBroker, AwsEventSchemasRegistry, AwsAppSyncGraphQlApi and AwsStepFunctionStateMachine.
[``botocore``] This SDK release provides customers the ability to use Header Order as a field to match.
